channel.title: Home on Rachel Manderfeld, Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Rachel Manderfeld, Portfolio

item.title: Chiniguchi Waterways Provincial Park Canoe Route Map
item.description: Map created using Ontario datasets in ArcGIS Pro and Mapublisher for AI.

item.title: Lake Explorer for Peterborough and the Kawarthas
item.description: Scope of project is lakes in Peterborough and the Kawarthas. Designed for general and citizen-scientist users. Made as part of collaborative final project for GIS program at Fleming College in partnership with Kawartha Conservation. Teammates include L. Greidanus and K. Jones-McGowan.

item.title: Kootenay Valley Remote Sensing Image Analysis
item.description: Three different methods of image analysis using Catalyst (PCI Geomatica): Pansharpened True Colour Composite, SWIR, Standard False Colour Composite.

item.title: Ranked Habitat Analysis for Salamanders
item.description: Ranked habitat analysis using suitable landcover, ideal elevations, and transportation interference in the area between Lindsay and Peterborough, Ontario. Datasets from Geospatial Data Canada, iNaturalist, and SOLRIS. Co-collaborator with L. Greidanus.

item.title: Supervised Classification of Oak Ridges Morraine
item.description: Supervised classification of orthophotography using PCI Geomatica / Catalyst of the Oak Ridges Morraine area.
